prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a colossal, hyper-muscular android warrior, vibrant ginger orange mohawk hair, gentle blue eyes, wearing heavy articulated green robotic armor plating, exposed mechanical chestplate, wide square face, thick neck
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme high fidelity textures, subtle surface imperfections on armor plating, detailed skin pores on face, volumetric rim lighting, sharp focus on mechanical joints
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth armor, blurry hair, doll, toy, simple shading, deformed hands, flat lighting, unrealistic proportions
